reviews.review:
Great game for the year 2004. It has great gameplay great story with good characters, great graphics or details.

8/10

Bu oyunu neden bu kadar bekledikten sonra oynadım bilmiyorum ama aptallık yapmışım bu oyun oynanmalı bence çünkü cidden adamlar yapmış. Half Life 1 deki mükemmel hikayenin cidden çok güzel bir devamı, oyun başlangıç da her şeye dikkat edip oynadım çok zevkliydi lakin yavaştan sıktı ve biraz daha hızlı oynamaya başladım lakin sonlarına doğru gene yavaşlayıp bakına bakına oynadım ve bu şekilde oynadım halde lamb başarımının 31/45 yaptım tek bir oynanışta ve zevkliydi fakat hovercraft ve araba kısımlarında cidden bir yere gittiğini hissettiriyordu lakin biraz kısa daha iyi olabilirdi lakin nasıl kısaltılır bilmiyorum oyunun formülünü bozmadan bunları geçersek oyunun fizik motoru güzeldi ve bunu göstermekten de hiç çekinmiyor ve bunu puzzellarla yapması çok hoş bir durum oyunda sevmediğimi söyleye bileceğim kısım sayısı çok az lakin tuhaf bir biçimde son kısımları bir başka değişle boss fight 'lar son olarak da şuna değinmek istiyorum Half Life 1 deki o hızlı oyundan hiçbir eser yok oyun cidden yavaşlamış başka bir oyun olsa dikkatimi çekmezdi lakin Half Life de bu hızlı oynanışı olmalı bence

[b]Artıları +[/b]
[b]-[/b]Mükemmel bir hikaye
[b]-[/b]Güzel Oynanış
[b]-[/b]Fizik motoru
[b]-[/b]Puzzellar
[b]-[/b]Tam dozunda Aksiyon
[b]-[/b]Mükemmel Optimizasyon
[b]-[/b]Grafikleri bu zamanda bile gideri var

[b]Eksileri -[/b]
[b]-[/b]Füze mekaniği (ep 1'de kafayı yedirtirdi, dar alanlarda bile fareyi nereye doğrul duysanız oraya gidiyor)
[b]-[/b]Half Life 1 deki hızlı oynanış yok

The game feels a little linear compared to newer games, and without ADS, set in a beautiful rich and detailed universe with an interesting and exciting story. 
The story more than makes up for the dated feel.
весело и интересно, кто не согласен-идёт на х уй
Es muy entretenido y tiene buenas historias

Half-Life 2 is undoubtedly a great game, well ahead of its time, a solid story that continues the events of the first game, an excellent and fun gameplay, a wide variety of scenarios, weapons and possible interactions. After 15 years, I played this game and finally understood the whole screenplay, the gameplay and the history of Half-Life. It's hard to believe that Valve had its foot in every major technology corner of the gaming industry, but it's true and the case for Half-Life 2 was Source's Physics engine.

I have not played this game since I was a kid. Still to this day, this game is amazing. After completing the game, you will want more. Half Life 2 will be in my top 10 favorite games of all time. This is a must have game.
It's a puzzle shooter. It's not an incredible FPS game. it's not a fun violent, shooter, it's a puzzler. A damn good one though.
A bit late to the party with this gem, but playing it made me wish I played it sooner.

Люблю эту игру всей душой и всей делом))

Олды поймут, что участвовать в приключениях Гордона Фримена-одно из лучших с чем приходилось сталкиваться.....
Ведь это одна из немногих игр, которую можно проходить бесконечное количество раз. По сюжету игра даст фору многим современным играм.....ну и естественно все же до сих пор жду продолжения.....
This game has always been fun but god has it aged horribly, right?

Обожаю эту игру всем сердцем-в ней круто всё: начиная от физики с графонием, заканчивая разнообразным геймплеем. Объяснять по тысячу раз одно и то же, я не вижу смысла. Скажу лишь об , о чём многие скорее всего не знают-а именно, за физику игры отвечает физический движок Havok, а не Source, который отвечает за графоний.

A much more cohesive story line most of the way through but it wouldn't be a Half-Life game without a "what the hell" kind of moment or two. A significant upgrade in gameplay, story, voice acting and visuals over its original game. The Gravity Gun is by far one of the more fun weapons to use but there are certainly times the weapons are a better means to dispatch enemies.
Frankly if you just start the series from this point, you will not miss anything over-arcing in the story as without deep diving with external research, at this point only a couple events referenced from the first game, the rest is rather self contained. 
Controls unfortunately didn't change much, including the weapon selection menu which is quite dated by the current gaming standards. Serviceable sure but not optimal. I felt Gordon was a bit slippery or carried momentum further than he should have on certain jumps or lacked height required to make smaller ledges.
As a whole I am quite pleased with the entire package of this game compared to the first three games in the series.
Played with Mouse and Keyboard and no mods.

Rise and shine Mr.Freeman, rise and shine...

Not that I wish to imply that you have been sleeping on the job. No one is more deserving of a rest, and all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until...

Well... Lets just say your hour has come again.

The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.

So, wake up Mr. Freeman. Wake up and... Smell the ashes.
After all these years, it's still a great game. Playing the Black Mesa remake of HalfLife made me want to try HL2 again. I'm glad I did.
